attributes.action: Please stop EU Beaurocrats from raiding Pension Pots  to finance the hole left by the banks
attributes.additional_details:
The bankers have had it, and didnt pay it back. Please tell the EU to keep their grubby hands off the working mens meagre pension savings. People have  worked all their life trying to build up something for retirement, being as they  can no longert rely on there being a state pension. The last thing they want is for ANYONE to take ANY risk (for NO return) with the little pot that has been accumulated

Here is the link:  http://www.reuters.com/article/2014/02/12/us-eu-banks-savings-idUSBREA1B1ZI20140212
